**Wikipedia summary**:  
<i><b>Symphoricarpos albus</b></i> is a species of flowering plant in the honeysuckle family known by the common name <b>common snowberry</b>. Native to North America, it is browsed by some animals and planted for ornamental and ecological purposes, but is poisonous to humans.
